original_text: And seeing one of them suffer wrong, he defended him, and avenged him that was oppressed, and smote the Egyptian:
korean_text: 한 사람이 원통한 일 당함을 보고 보호하여 압제 받는 자를 위하여 원수를 갚아 애굽 사람을 쳐 죽이니라

sentences.original_text: And seeing one of them suffer wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 한 명이 부당한 고통을 받는 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: and avenged him that was oppressed
